name: Jurassic Beat
description:
We have created a simple story game that anyone, even little kids, can play. In this story, there are a variety of dinosaurs to meet and play mini-games.

We are developing the last scene to jump into another verse to see real dinosaurs. Please consider while you play.

1. Fixed position to give safe condition and avoid dizziness while the user play

2. Low poly graphic -

3. Running time: 10~12 Minutes

4. Interaction factors: Touch Dino's head, Indicating the fruits, Shooting Magic, Beating Jurassic drums, Feeding fish to Ptera, Poping Vegetables, etc.

We have another game for 'Ocean Beat' which has a similar concept to this but plays in the Ocean. You can check and try for that also.

https://vrkiz.itch.io/oceanbeat

* We have Korean Version too. If you want to play in the Korean version, please let us know.

Thank you!
